ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of LLOYD MATTHEW RICHARDS of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective January 23, 2017.
